title: AI-Powered Traffic Management System
description: A smart city initiative to optimize traffic flow using real-time data analysis and adaptive signal control, reducing congestion in Lagos metropolitan area.

title: Robotic Assistant for Elderly Care
description: Developing a companion robot to assist elderly individuals with daily tasks, medication reminders, and provide social interaction to combat loneliness.

title: Precision Agriculture Drone
description: Utilizing AI-equipped drones for crop monitoring, pest detection, and optimized resource allocation to improve agricultural yields across Nigeria.

title: Natural Language Interface for Databases
description: Creating a system that allows users to query complex databases using natural language commands in multiple Nigerian languages.
